definitions.definition: A bag or bladder to hold a reservoir of gas , as in a hot-air balloon .
A lighter-than-air aircraft ; a balloon or dirigible .
A person who is overly garrulous or prone to making empty , unsupportable statements; a windbag .

main_definition: A bag or bladder to hold a reservoir of gas , as in a hot-air balloon .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A lighter-than-air aircraft ; a balloon or dirigible .
( figuratively , derogatory ) A person who is overly garrulous or prone to making empty , unsupportable statements; a windbag .
